description: This file defines a 'Coding Agent' using the agno framework, setting up its model, storage, and a playground for interaction, and exposes a FastAPI app.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific configurations.

classes.name: Ollama
classes.description: Model class for Ollama models used by the agent.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: Provides a playground environment for the agent.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Handles SQLite storage for agent data.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Returns the FastAPI application for the playground.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Runs the playground server with the specified app.
